Uses of Class
javax.swing.text.DefaultFormatter.ReplaceHolder

  • Packages that use DefaultFormatter.ReplaceHolder 
    Package Description
    javax.swing.text  

    • Uses of DefaultFormatter.ReplaceHolder in javax.swing.text

      Subclasses of DefaultFormatter.ReplaceHolder in javax.swing.text 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) static class  InternationalFormatter.ExtendedReplaceHolder
      As InternationalFormatter replaces the complete text on every edit, ExtendedReplaceHolder keeps track of the offset and length passed into canReplace.
      Fields in javax.swing.text declared as DefaultFormatter.ReplaceHolder 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) DefaultFormatter.ReplaceHolder DefaultFormatter.replaceHolder
      Used during replace to track the region to replace.
      Methods in javax.swing.text that return DefaultFormatter.ReplaceHolder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) DefaultFormatter.ReplaceHolder InternationalFormatter.getReplaceHolder(DocumentFilter.FilterBypass fb, int offset, int length, String text, AttributeSet attrs)
      Overriden to return an instance of ExtendedReplaceHolder.
      (package private) DefaultFormatter.ReplaceHolder DefaultFormatter.getReplaceHolder(DocumentFilter.FilterBypass fb, int offset, int length, String text, AttributeSet attrs)
      Returns the ReplaceHolder to track the replace of the specified text.
      Methods in javax.swing.text with parameters of type DefaultFormatter.ReplaceHolder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) boolean MaskFormatter.canReplace(DefaultFormatter.ReplaceHolder rh)
      This method does the following (assuming !getAllowsInvalid()): iterate over the max of the deleted region or the text length, for each character: If it is valid (matches the mask at the particular position, or matches the literal character at the position), allow it Else if the position identifies a literal character, add it.
      (package private) boolean InternationalFormatter.canReplace(DefaultFormatter.ReplaceHolder rh)
      Overriden in an attempt to honor the literals.
      (package private) boolean DefaultFormatter.canReplace(DefaultFormatter.ReplaceHolder rh)
      Returns true if the edit described by rh will result in a legal value.
      (package private) boolean MaskFormatter.isValidEdit(DefaultFormatter.ReplaceHolder rh) 
      (package private) boolean DefaultFormatter.isValidEdit(DefaultFormatter.ReplaceHolder rh) 
      (package private) boolean InternationalFormatter.replace(DefaultFormatter.ReplaceHolder rh)
      When in !allowsInvalid mode the text is reset on every edit, thus supers implementation will position the cursor at the wrong position.
      (package private) boolean DefaultFormatter.replace(DefaultFormatter.ReplaceHolder rh)
      If the edit described by rh is legal, this will return true, commit the edit (if necessary) and update the cursor position.
